search_term: look up at least 4 sources and tell me the lastest government news

Videos President Trump Signs Executive Orders in the Oval Office, May 23, 2025 May 23, 2025

Explore More Videos 01:54 MAGA Minute, May 23, 2025 May 23, 2025 01:24 President Trump Signs Four Executive Orders on Nuclear Energy: A Huge Day For the Nuclear Industry May 23, 2025 38:40 President Trump Participates in a MAHA Commission Event May 22, 2025 18:07 President Trump Welcomes the 2025 Men’s NCAA Basketball Champions, The University of Florida Gators May 21, 2025 View all videos

The News Roundup For May 16, 2025: 1A The Supreme Court hears oral arguments in a case about President Donald Trump's executive order on birthright citizenship. House Republicans unveil a bill to cut congressional spending. The U.S. and China hammer out a trade deal that reduces tariffs for 90 days. President Donald Trump visits the Middle East, announcing a slew of economic deals and partnerships. But back home, a luxury jet from the Qatari government takes over the headlines. Want to support 1A? Give to your local public radio station and subscribe to this podcast. Have questions? Connect with us. Listen to 1A sponsor-free by signing up for 1A+ at plus.npr.org/the1a.

The News Roundup For May 16, 2025 Listen · 1:22:24 1-Hour,

May 23, 2025 PBS News Hour full episode May 23, 2025 7:40 PM EDT Leave your feedback Share Copy URL https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/may-23-2025-pbs-news-hour-full-episode Email Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Pinterest Tumblr Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Friday on the News Hour... Friday on the News Hour, Harvard sues after the Trump administration tries to ban the university from enrolling international students. Cryptocurrency investors spend millions for a seat at the table with the president in a private dinner that's fueling concerns about Trump profiting from the presidency. Plus, the former U.S. ambassador to Ukraine explains why she resigned. Listen to the Broadcast Subscribe to the Full Show Podcast Play 00:00 … Volume Segments From This Episode What Trump’s legal and political clash with Harvard means for higher education 7 min News Wrap: Trump threatens new tariffs on EU imports and iPhones 6 min Private event with crypto customers fuels accusations of Trump profiting off presidency 7 min ‘We’re playing into Russia’s hands’: Ex-U.S. ambassador to Ukraine on why she resigned 7 min How NOAA funding cuts could make it harder to predict and prepare for severe weather 7 min Brooks and Capehart on House Republicans passing Trump’s legislative agenda 11 min Basketball legend Dawn Staley reflects on successes and challenges in ‘Uncommon Favor’ 8 min Support Provided By: Learn more Support PBS News: More Ways to Watch PBS Video PBS App YouTube Facebook Educate your inbox Subscribe to Here’s the Deal, our politics newsletter for analysis you won’t find anywhere else.
